meanings.definition: A discoloration or mark caused by a foreign substance.
meanings.sent1: The coffee stains on the table were difficult to remove.
meanings.sent2: She tried to clean the ink stains from her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The ketchup stains on his face made him look like a messy eater.
meanings.sent4: The emotional stains of the past lingered in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The wine stains on the carpet were a vivid reminder of the party.

meanings.definition: To mark or discolor with something that is not easily removed.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally stains his shirt with mustard.
meanings.sent2: The mud stains on the floor were from his shoes.
meanings.sent3: She stains her hands with paint while working on the art project.
meanings.sent4: The lies he told would forever stains his reputation.
meanings.sent5: The betrayal stains their friendship with mistrust.
